document_data.mainbody:
Dusk to Dawn was a traveling tavern in the late-15 century DR. The taverns name derived from the fact that it always set up shop around dusk, then once dawn hit the proprietor would pack everything up.The date for all Year 1 RPGA sanctioned adventures is considered to be 1479 DR for the purposes of this wiki.
This tavern largely consisted of a tent, casks, and kegs.
Dusk to Dawn was always situated in the Mistshore neighborhood of Waterdeeps Dock Ward. It set up shop wherever there was a large open area.
